comment: Manufactured form of the thyroid hormone, THYROXINE (T4)
Nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID), used for treating pain, fever, and inflammation
IRON supplement, 357mg of iron polymaltose = 100mg of elemental iron

Of PROGESTINS family, norethisterone acetate (abbreviated as NETA), also known as norethindrone acetate and sold under the brand name Primolut-Nor
Anxiolytic drug, probably effective in patients with estrogen-driven recurrent fever
